name: i Kick-ASS in the Beast World
name_original: i Kick-ASS in the Beast World
description:
NOTE: This game is currently EARLY ACCESS and up to CHAPTER 1 only.

Embark on an epic isekai adventure and follow the journey of a gamer who was suddenly transported into a world of beasts. Survive the harsh environment and adapt to the unfamiliar creatures to uncover the truth behind his arrival. Help the locals in their quest for freedom and justice, and discover the key to unlocking the mystery of his predicament. Will he find his way back home or be forever trapped in this wild realm? Join our hero on his perilous journey and unravel the full story of this unforgettable isekai experience!

Game Features:

  • Lots of skills & weapons to discover
  • Craft potions, weapons and armors
  • Swap team members during battle
  • Boost for stronger attacks
  • Swap weapons during battles
  • 2 hours of gameplay

Latest Version: 0.2 Chapter 1 completed.
